request.description:
List of all tradable currencies and their pricing data.  
  
This API can be used to get `currency_id` which you'll need in \`order\` apis and \`deposit and withdrawal\` apis.
To check if user is already registered with CT or not, to decide if you need to register this user with us or just need login.
Register user with CT using Email and Phone number

response.body:
{
    "data": {
        "email": "user1@domain.com",
        "user_name": "user1@domain.com",
        "delete_flag": false,
        "role": "USER",
        "email_verified": true,
        "mobile_number_verified": true,
        "is_login_active": true,
        "is_trading_active": true,
        "is_withdrawal_active": true,
        "id": 25296
    }
}

request.description: Generate Auth Token for a registered user on CTI, for further calls
Add Verified bank account details of user
Add kyc Details of User
Users All Details

response.body:

request.description: Withdrawal fees charged from the user account at the time of INR withdrawal
To initiate an INR withdrawal, an OTP will be sent on user's registered mobile number.
INR withdrawal initiates with this API.

request.description: Withdrawal fees charged from the user account at the time of crypto withdrawal

query.description: String (Payament gateway name from gatway list api)

request.description: Initiate INR deposit from the selected gateway, for more info, please refer to the documentation of the respective payment gateway

query.description: String (Payament gateway name from gatway list api)

item.name: Crypto Depost address with Currency Id

request.description: Returns \`deposit address\` assigned to the user for the given crypto currency, any deposits made to this deposit address will be credited to user's crypto wallet automatically.

query.description: enum (CANCELLED, FAILED, REJECTED, PENDING, INTERNALLY_FAILED, COMPLETED )

request.description: List of all Deposit/Withdrawal in INR or Crypto of the user
